name: Unstuffed Peppers
description: Love stuffed peppers but hate the prep? This dish has you covered: it has all the flavour and comfort of a baked dish but without any of the mess. It’s done in way less time in the microwave and you only need to wash one dish—thank you, Epicure Steamers! This is a forkin’ good meal that doesn’t even need a knife to dig in.

ingredients.name: Tomato Soup Seasoning or Spanish Rice Seasoning

preparation: In Round Steamer, add rice, seasoning, tomato paste, and water. Stir to combine. Crumble in turkey. Chop peppers; add to steamer.
Cover; microwave on high 17 min, or until rice is tender and turkey is cooked through.  Stir to combine.
Top with cheese. Microwave, uncovered, 30 sec or until cheese is melted. If you have time, let rest 2 min to let the moisture redistribute.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens with a drizzle of vinegar or a squeeze of lemon juice.

products.name: Tomato Soup Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: If you could pour nostalgia into a bowl, it would look and taste like Tomato Soup. With a distinctive sweet and tangy tomato flavour and velvety texture, this blend is sugar and sodium-conscious and gluten free. Nutritional yeast brings creaminess to a soup that only requires two ingredients, tomato paste and water, and 20 minutes to make in the microwave. The only thing to add is a grilled cheese sandwich!

products.name: Spanish Rice Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Spanish Rice, or arroz rojo, is the taco night sidekick you’ve been waiting for! Ready in just 20 minutes, it pairs well with tacos, enchiladas, and Chicken Barbacoa. It’s a great filling for tasty burritos with the flavour of fresh tomato, oregano, cumin, and coriander. No need to buy and chop tomatoes and onions—follow the foolproof, one-pot recipe on the back of the pack for perfect rice every time.

products.name: Round Steamer
summary: A must-have tool for every kitchen! Our game-changing silicone Round Steamer cooks food faster and more evenly in the microwave. Bring a whole, juicy Roast Chicken to the table in 20 minutes, perfectly cook fluffy grains, baked potatoes, and tender veggies, or meal prep soups and chowders for easy weeknight meals. The possibilities are endless!
